channel.title: When u ip ban some 1 they log in and a acc is created
channel.description:
when i run my server a crasher came :mad:
so i iped him
but............ he logs in and it says [code]ip is banned[/code]
but when i do [code]::players[/code] all the accs he used are created still......
and it makes it so no 1 can get on when he made 104 char.....
any 1 no how to stop this? :confused: say if u do it would be a huge help! :D
and they dont show up in char files and banning dont help..

item.title: When u ip ban some 1 they log in and a acc is created
item.dc:creator: @sh1pwr3ck sh1pwr3ck
item.description:
@sh1pwr3ck wrote:

You can't ip ban because syi doesn't really make character's, it makes nulled packet's that appear to be character's without actually being created.

o… any way to stop tht tho?

Read full topic
item.source: When u ip ban some 1 they log in and a acc is created
